Santa Claus:
Have you heard about the Santa privilege?
Apprentice Santas spend a lot of time taking care of weak Rudolphs.
Raising a healthy Rudolph is very important to us.
But during the Christmas season, we don't have a lot of time to spend taking care of the Rudolphs.
This year, one apprentice Santa came up with a good idea. We would give people the gift of taking care of a weak Rudolph. It's a great idea, don't you think? We thought it would also give people the gift of joy in doing something good.
Well? Are you interested in this Santa present?
